author: Jeremy Berke
title: Cuomo just extended New York's stay-at-home order to May 15
description: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo is extending the state's stay-at-home orders to May 15. Schools and non-essential businesses will be closed and social distancing guidelines will remain in place. Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories. Gov. Andrew Cuomo…
content:
Gov. Andrew Cuomo says New York's stay-at-home order will be extended to May 15, in his daily coronavirus update from Albany.
The stay-at-home order, called 'New York on Pause' extends to schools, all non-essential businesses and workers. The state's social … [+541 chars]
